text: durvalayin lesa salakanu labamin siṭī pirisaṭa, mahapoḷovē ehi api samṛddhiya æti kaḷa nægenahira diśāvan hā baṭahira diśāvan uruma kara dunimu. isrāīl daruvan ivasīmen siṭi bævin num̆bē paramādhipatigē alaṁkāra vadana ovun kerehi pūrṇavat viya. firavun hā ohugē pirisa sidu karamin siṭi dǣ da ovun usaṭa tanamin siṭi dǣ da api muḷumaṇinma vināśa kara dæmuvemu
